metadata.title: CVE-2022-45956 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Boa Web Server versions 0.94.13 through 0.94.14 fail to validate thecorrect security constraint on the HEAD HTTP method allowing everyone tobypass the Basic Authorization mechanism.

criterions.comment: boa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
